pv40:4.3: Taṃ dāni me na → taṃ dāni ve (bj) | taṃ dāni me (pts1-2) | na dāni me taṃ (mr), paribhogameti → paribhogaṃ na upeti (bj, pts1-2) | paribhogaṃ upeti (s2, s3)
pv40:5.1: Haññāmi → vihaññāmi (s2, s3, pts1, mr), vāyamāmi → vāyamāmi ca (s2, s3, pts1)
pv40:11.1: gantvāna piṭṭhito gaṇheyyāsi → iṅgha tuvaṃ piṭṭhito gaṇha ucchuṃ (bj, pts1-2)
